data.app_name: Hololab VR - NCSG Inspection Foundation Module 3: Masonry Wood External
data.description:
**Hololab NCSG Wood Burning Freestanding Stoves VR Application**

The Hololab National Chimney Sweep Guild VR application provides users with essential skills to inspect and maintain wood-burning freestanding stoves in compliance with NCSG standards. This course features interactive slide content, desktop-based activities, realistic simulations, and detailed testing. Users are challenged to perform inspections with randomized issues in a virtual residential setting, ensuring all necessary procedures are followed.

**VR Controls and PPE –** Learn how to navigate the virtual environment while getting acquainted with essential personal protective equipment.

**Responsibility & Worksite Hazard Assessment –** Operate in a simulated environment to identify and mitigate hazards commonly encountered during inspections of wood-burning freestanding stoves.

**Familiarization –** Understand different types of wood-burning freestanding stoves and their common features.

**Freestanding Stove Inspection –** Utilize the official NCSG checklist to thoroughly inspect wood-burning freestanding stoves.

**Real-World Simulation –** Complete the inspection by correctly identifying issues with maximum safety awareness and forensic skills.

Data reports for review are saved and stored for engagement metrics and simulation performance analysis.

Any off-platform monetization of content accessible in this app conforms to the Oculus Bulk IAP or Subscription Licenses app policy outlined here: https://developer.oculus.com/policy/app-policies
